headline: An Elite Outcry: Not in My Unspoiled Paradise
abstract: A company wants to build a geothermal plant in Umbria. Locals — and celebrities who live there — don’t want it.
lead_paragraph: CASTEL GIORGIO, ITALY — Fausto Carotenuto, the owner of a spiritual wellness and yoga center in Umbria, the ancient Etruscan heartland of Italy, senses bad energy underfoot. A geothermal company wants to build a plant on a fallow field near his land. He envisions apocalyptic consequences if he and his allies fail to stop it.
